# traitCollection

**Instance Property**

Traits to use when creating the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
var traitCollection: UITraitCollection { get }
```

## Discussion

You configure the traits when you create snapshotter options. See [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapSnapshotter/Options/traitCollection].
title: traitCollection
